long_description: When you travel far and wide, all 4 seasons can happen in a single afternoon. The merino wool Ibex VT Full-Zip Sweater wears well any time of year to keep you comfortable and warm. Finely tuned 18.5-micron New Zealand merino wool is a great weight for year-round use; works well worn next to skin. Soft merino wool is naturally warm, breathable and water resistant. Raglan sleeves allow unhindered shoulder movement. Full-zip front. Ibex VT Full-Zip Jersey Sweater has a regular fit. Machine washable; air dry. Wool meets ZQ(TM) standards, ensuring environmental, social and economic sustainability, as well as animal welfare and traceability back to the source.
short_description: When you travel far and wide, all 4 seasons can happen in a single afternoon. The merino wool Ibex VT Full-Zip Sweater wears well any time of year to keep you comfortable and warm.
